00015 #ifndef SCRIPT_H
00016 #define SCRIPT_H
00017 
00018 
00019 // defines for conditional compilation: in this way you can choose
00020 // at compile-time which interpreter you want to support: this is 
00021 // very useful when you have not time to get all the libs for all
00022 // the interpreters supported by wxScript.
00023 //
00024 // To define this, you should use the universal -D (or /D for MSVC)
00025 // compile option in your makefiles for all the wxScript source files:
00026 //
00027 //    gcc -c -DwxSCRIPT_NO_CINT src/script.cpp         [ example how the
00028 //    gcc -c -DwxSCRIPT_NO_CINT src/sclua.cpp       <--[ makefile output
00029 //    gcc -c -DwxSCRIPT_NO_CINT src/sccint.cpp         [ should appear
00030 //    [...]
00031 // 
00032 #ifndef wxSCRIPT_NO_CINT
00033 #define wxSCRIPT_USE_CINT
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #ifndef wxSCRIPT_NO_UNDERC
00037 #define wxSCRIPT_USE_UNDERC
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #ifndef wxSCRIPT_NO_LUA
00041 #define wxSCRIPT_USE_LUA
00042 #endif
00043 
00044

00059 #ifndef wxSAFE_DELETE
00060 #define wxSAFE_DELETE(x)                                { if (x) delete x; x = NULL; }
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #ifndef wxSAFE_DELETE_ARRAY
00064 #define wxSAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(x)                  { if (x) delete [] x; x = NULL; }
00065 #endif

00068 #ifdef __VISUALC__
00069 #define wxSCRIPT_EXPORT         _declspec(dllexport)
00070 #else
00071 #define wxSCRIPT_EXPORT     // GCC always exports everything
00072 #endif
00073 #endif

00104 enum wxScriptTypeGeneric {
00105 
00106         wxSTG_UNDEFINED = -1,           
00107

00109         wxSTG_INT,
00110         wxSTG_LONG,
00111         wxSTG_CHAR,
00112         wxSTG_FLOAT,
00113         wxSTG_DOUBLE,
00114         wxSTG_BOOL,

00126 class wxScriptTypeInfo
00127 {
00128 protected:
00129 
00134         wxString m_strName;
00135 
00136 public:
00137         wxScriptTypeInfo(const wxString &str = wxEmptyString) { Set(str); }
00138         wxScriptTypeInfo(wxScriptTypeGeneric type) { SetGenericType(type); }
00139         virtual ~wxScriptTypeInfo() {}
00140 
00141         // miscellaneous
00142         virtual void DeepCopy(const wxScriptTypeInfo *p)                { m_strName = p->m_strName; }
00143         virtual bool Match(const wxScriptTypeInfo &p) const             { return (GetName().IsSameAs(p.GetName(), FALSE)); }
00144         virtual bool Match(const wxScriptTypeInfo *p) const             { return p != NULL && Match(*p); }
00145         friend bool operator==(const wxScriptTypeInfo &first, const wxScriptTypeInfo &second) 
00146                 { return first.Match(second); }
00147 
00148         // setters
00149         virtual void Set(const wxString &str);
00150         virtual void SetGenericType(wxScriptTypeGeneric t);
00151         virtual void SetAsPointer()                     { Set(GetName() + "*"); }
00152         virtual void SetAsReference()           { Set(GetName() + "&"); }
00153         
00154         // getters
00155         wxString GetPointerTypeName() const;
00156         wxString GetName() const                                                { return m_strName; }
00157         wxScriptTypeInfo GetPointerType() const                 { return wxScriptTypeInfo(GetPointerTypeName()); }
00158         wxScriptTypeGeneric GetGenericType() const;
00159 
00160         // checkers
00161         bool isPointer() const;
00162         bool isReference() const;
00163         bool isValid() const                    { return !m_strName.IsEmpty(); }
00164 };

00170 class wxScriptVar
00171 {
00172 protected:
00173 
00175         wxScriptTypeInfo m_tType;
00176 
00178         union {
00179                 long m_content;
00180                 double m_floatcontent;
00181         };
00182 
00183 public:
00184         wxScriptVar(const wxString &type = wxEmptyString, 
00185                                 const wxString &content = wxEmptyString) : m_content(0) {
00186                 SetType(type);
00187                 SetContent(content);
00188         }
00189 
00199         wxScriptVar(const wxString &type,
00200                                 int *pointer) : m_content((long)pointer) {
00201 
00202                 SetType(type);
00203                 wxASSERT(GetType().isPointer());
00204         }
00205 
00206         virtual ~wxScriptVar() {}
00207 
00208 
00209 
00212 
00214         virtual void SetType(const wxString &str) { m_tType.Set(str); }
00215 
00217         virtual void SetContent(const wxString &);
00218         virtual void SetContent(const char *str) { SetContent(wxString(str)); }
00219         virtual void SetContent(char *str) { SetContent(wxString(str)); }
00220         virtual void SetContent(long l) { m_content = l; }
00221         virtual void SetContent(double l) { m_floatcontent = l; }
00222         virtual void SetContent(bool l) { m_content = (l != 0); }
00223         virtual void SetContent(void *l) { m_content = (long)l; }
00224         virtual void SetContent(const void *l) { m_content = (long)l; }
00225 
00227         void Set(const wxString &type, const wxString &content)         { SetType(type); SetContent(content); }
00228         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, char *content)                       { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00229         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, long content)                        { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00230         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, double content)                      { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00231         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, bool content)                        { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00232         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, void *content)                       { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00233         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, const wxString &content) { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00234 
00236         virtual void ResetContent();
00237 
00239 
00240 
00241 
00244 
00246         wxScriptTypeInfo GetType() const        { return m_tType; }
00247 
00249         long GetContentLong() const                     { return m_content; }
00250 
00252         double GetContentDouble() const         { return (m_tType == wxSTG_INT || m_tType == wxSTG_LONG) ? m_content : m_floatcontent; }
00253 
00255         virtual wxString GetContentString() const;      
00256 
00259         virtual void *GetPointer() const        { return (m_tType.isPointer() ? (void*)m_content : NULL); }
00260 
00262 };

00267 class wxScriptFunction
00268 {
00269 protected:
00270 
00272         wxString m_strName;
00273 
00275         wxScriptTypeInfo m_tReturn;
00276 
00278         wxScriptTypeInfo m_pArgList[wxSCRIPTFNC_MAX_ARGS];
00279 
00281         int m_nArgCount;
00282 
00283 protected:
00284 
00287         wxString GetCallString(wxScriptVar *arr) const;
00288 
00289 public:
00290 
00292         wxScriptFunction(const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
00293                                         const wxString &ret = wxEmptyString,
00294                                         wxScriptTypeInfo *arr = NULL, int n = 0) { 
00295                 m_nArgCount = 0;
00296                 Set(name, ret, arr, n);
00297         }
00298 
00299         virtual ~wxScriptFunction() {}
00300 
00301 
00303         virtual void DeepCopy(const wxScriptFunction *tocopy) {
00304                 m_strName = tocopy->m_strName;
00305                 m_nArgCount = tocopy->m_nArgCount;
00306                 m_tReturn.DeepCopy(&tocopy->m_tReturn);
00307 
00308                 for (int i=0; i < m_nArgCount; i++)
00309                         m_pArgList[i].DeepCopy(&tocopy->m_pArgList[i]);
00310         }
00311 
00314         virtual wxScriptFunction *Clone() const = 0;
00315 
00318         virtual bool Match(const wxScriptTypeInfo *ret, int argc, ...);
00319 
00321         virtual bool Exec(wxScriptVar &ret, wxScriptVar *arg) const = 0;
00322 
00324         virtual void Set(const wxString &name, const wxString &ret, 
00325                                          wxScriptTypeInfo *arr, int n);
00326 
00327 
00330 
00332         wxString GetName() const        { return m_strName; }
00333 
00335         int GetArgCount() const         { return m_nArgCount; }
00336 
00338         wxScriptTypeInfo GetRetType() const                     { return m_tReturn; }
00339 
00341         wxScriptTypeInfo GetArgType(int n) const        { return m_pArgList[n]; }
00342 
00344 };

00349 class wxScriptFunctionArray
00350 {
00351 protected:
00352 
00361         wxArrayPtrVoid m_arr;
00362 
00365         wxString m_strToStrip;
00366 
00367 public:
00368         wxScriptFunctionArray(const wxString &tostrip = wxEmptyString) : m_strToStrip(tostrip) {}
00369         virtual ~wxScriptFunctionArray() { Clear(); }
00370 
00371 
00372         // --------
00373         // Getters
00374         // --------
00375 
00376         wxScriptFunction *Get(int idx) const            { return (wxScriptFunction *)m_arr.Item(idx); }
00377         wxScriptFunction *Get(const wxString &fncname, int n = 0) const;
00378         int GetIdx(const wxString &fncname, int n = 0) const;
00379 
00380         int GetCountOf(const wxString &fncname) const;
00381         wxString GetName(int n) const;
00382         wxString GetPrefixToStrip() const                       { return m_strToStrip; }
00383         int GetCount() const                                            { return m_arr.GetCount(); }
00384         wxArrayPtrVoid &GetArray()                                      { return m_arr; }
00385 
00386 
00387         // --------------
00388         // Miscellaneous
00389         // --------------
00390 
00391         void Insert(wxScriptFunction *toadd, int idx);
00392         void Append(wxScriptFunction *toadd)                            { m_arr.Insert(toadd, GetCount()); }
00393         void Append(const wxScriptFunctionArray &arr);
00394 
00395         void Remove(int i);
00396         void Remove(const wxString &fncname, int n = 0)         { Remove(GetIdx(fncname, n)); }
00397 
00398         void SetPrefixToStrip(const wxString &str)                      { m_strToStrip = str; }
00399         void DeepCopy(const wxScriptFunctionArray *arr);
00400         void Clear();
00401 };

00406 enum wxScriptFileType {
00407 
00408         wxRECOGNIZE_SCRIPTFILE = -1,
00409 
00410         wxCINT_SCRIPTFILE = 0,          // extension = "cxx"
00411         wxUNDERC_SCRIPTFILE = 1,        // extension = "uc"
00412         wxLUA_SCRIPTFILE = 2,           // extension = "lua"
00413 
00414         wxSCRIPT_SUPPORTED_FORMATS = 3
00415 };

00465 class wxScriptInterpreter
00466 {
00467 protected:              // use wxCINT::Get(), wxUnderC::Get() or wxLua::Get() to
00468                                 // access them...
00469 
00471         static wxCINT *m_pCINT;
00472         static wxUnderC *m_pUnderC;
00473         static wxLua *m_pLua;
00474 
00475 public:         // ctor & dtor
00476 
00477         wxScriptInterpreter();
00478         virtual ~wxScriptInterpreter();
00479 
00481         static wxString m_strLastErr;
00482 
00483 public:         // static functions
00484 
00485         // A STATIC function which returns the global instance of this class
00486         // cannot exist because wxScriptInterpreter is an abstract class
00487         // and thus, only derived classes (wxCINT, wxUnderC and wxLua) can
00488         // be instantiated; you can access them using their static Get()
00489         // functions: wxCINT::Get(), wxUnderC::Get() ....       
00490 
00492         static bool Init(bool bCINT = TRUE, bool bUnderC = TRUE, bool bLua = TRUE);
00493 
00495         static void Cleanup();
00496 
00498         static bool areAllReady();
00499 
00502         static wxString GetLastErr()    { return m_strLastErr; }
00503 
00505         static void GetTotalFunctionList(wxScriptFunctionArray &);
00506 
00509         static wxScriptFile *Load(const wxString &filename, 
00510                         wxScriptFileType type = wxRECOGNIZE_SCRIPTFILE);
00511 
00512 public:         // virtual functions
00513 
00515         virtual bool isReady() const = 0;
00516 
00518         virtual void GetFunctionList(wxScriptFunctionArray &) const = 0;
00519 };
